440.shortDesc: A true boomer gamer who probably still misses the Orange Box days.
440.longDesc: You've spent more time picking hats than some people spend on their actual appearance.

570.shortDesc: Quit while your ahead, MOBAddiction can be hard on your blood pressure.
570.longDesc: Touch grass. Please. Your family misses you.

8930.shortDesc: Your concept of 'just one more turn' has ruined many sleep schedules.
8930.longDesc: You've built and destroyed more civilizations than history itself. Time is but a construct when you're playing this game.

379720.shortDesc: You enjoy the simple pleasures of ripping and tearing until it is done.
379720.longDesc: The demons have nightmares about you. Your blood is 50% adrenaline, 50% heavy metal.

1222670.shortDesc: God complex? No, just someone who enjoys controlling virtual people's lives.
1222670.longDesc: You've spent more on DLC than most people spend on rent. Your Sims have better lives than you do.

292030.shortDesc: You've said 'winds howling' more times than you care to admit.
292030.longDesc: You know the geography of Velen better than your own neighborhood. Gwent isn't just a mini-game, it's a lifestyle.

730.shortDesc: Rush B, don't stop, cyka blyat is your daily mantra.
730.longDesc: You could give a TED talk on the spray patterns of every weapon. Your reflexes would make a cat jealous.

252950.shortDesc: Soccer was too boring until they added rocket-powered cars.
252950.longDesc: You've said 'What a save!' sarcastically so many times that you do it in real life now. Your aerial control is better than your real-life coordination.

105600.shortDesc: 2D Minecraft? No, this is a lifestyle choice with more bosses.
105600.longDesc: You've dug to hell and back more times than Dante. Your home decor skills in-game vastly outshine your real-life living space.

413150.shortDesc: Escaping capitalism by becoming a farming tycoon.
413150.longDesc: You know more about crop rotation than actual farmers. You've mentally dated every NPC in Pelican Town multiple times.

578080.shortDesc: Your heart rate while playing could qualify as cardio exercise.
578080.longDesc: You've memorized the sound of footsteps so well you get paranoid hearing them in real life. The phrase 'Winner winner chicken dinner' gives you an adrenaline rush.

230410.shortDesc: Space ninjas with commitment issues to other games.
230410.longDesc: You speak fluent Tenno and grind more efficiently than industrial machinery. Your fashion frame game is stronger than your real wardrobe choices.

359550.shortDesc: Your drywall repair skills have improved since playing this game.
359550.longDesc: You've learned more about tactical breaching than actual military personnel. The sound of drones makes you instinctively look at the ceiling.

271590.shortDesc: Living your best life... of crime and questionable decisions.
271590.longDesc: You've spent more money on virtual cars than you'll ever afford in real life. Los Santos feels more like home than your actual city.

218620.shortDesc: Your retirement plan is probably a heist at this point.
218620.longDesc: You hear 'Guys, the thermal drill, go get it' in your sleep. Your stealth skills in-game are inversely proportional to your subtlety in real life.

550.shortDesc: You've prepared for the zombie apocalypse by shooting virtual ones.
550.longDesc: Your reaction to hearing a child cry is to look for a nearby witch. You've shouted 'Pills here!' at a pharmacy at least once.

294100.shortDesc: Your colony management skills are better than your life management skills.
294100.longDesc: You've committed war crimes that would make dictators blush. Human leather hats no longer seem that strange to you.

236390.shortDesc: You can identify military vehicles better than their actual crews.
236390.longDesc: You've researched more about WWII vehicle specifications than actual historians. The grind has become part of your personality.

252490.shortDesc: Trust issues? Probably developed from playing this game.
252490.longDesc: You've been betrayed more times in this game than in all your real-life relationships combined. The sound of footsteps gives you PTSD.

377160.shortDesc: Another settlement needs your help, and you can't say no.
377160.longDesc: You've spent more time modding the game than actually playing it. Your dog in-game has received more attention than most people in your life.

620.shortDesc: The cake may be a lie, but your problem-solving skills are not.
620.longDesc: You think with portals in real life situations. GLaDOS's voice narrates your failures on a daily basis.

72850.shortDesc: You've taken an arrow to the knee more times than you can count.
72850.longDesc: You've started the game 27 times but have only finished the main quest twice. Your mod folder is bigger than the actual game.

22380.shortDesc: The Mojave makes you wish for a nuclear winter.
22380.longDesc: You've sided with every faction at least once and still can't decide which ending is best. Big Iron plays in your head whenever you're in the desert.

1091500.shortDesc: You've become the legend you always wanted to be in Night City.
1091500.longDesc: Your body is mostly chrome at this point. You've lost count of how many times you've visited every ripperdoc in Night City.

227300.shortDesc: Who knew virtual trucking could be so therapeutic?
227300.longDesc: You know European highway systems better than actual truck drivers. Your virtual truck is cleaner and better maintained than your real car.

242760.shortDesc: Your survival skills are impressive, your cannibal-avoidance skills even more so.
242760.longDesc: You've built more elaborate bases in a cannibal-infested forest than most architects do in safe cities. The sound of breaking sticks makes you instinctively grab the nearest weapon.

6060._name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
6060.shortDesc: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away, you started playing this game and never truly stopped.
6060.longDesc: You've explored the light and dark sides more thoroughly than any Jedi or Sith. HK-47's dialogue is your preferred way of addressing meatbags.

594650.shortDesc: The bayou calls to you, and death is just part of the experience.
594650.longDesc: You can identify every weapon by sound alone. You've developed a sixth sense for detecting players through walls and across compounds.

1174180.shortDesc: You've found a plan, you just need money and faith.
1174180.longDesc: You spend more time hunting and fishing than advancing the story. Arthur Morgan feels more real to you than some actual people you know.

648800.shortDesc: You've made surviving on a tiny floating platform look easy.
648800.longDesc: Your resource management skills are impeccable. You've turned a few planks into a floating mansion while constantly worrying about that shark.

322330.shortDesc: Starvation is just one of many creative ways you've died in this game.
322330.longDesc: Winter isn't coming, it's already here and you're strangely prepared for it. Your survival skills in-game are inversely proportional to what they would be in real life.

387990.shortDesc: Engineering solutions that would make actual engineers question their careers.
387990.longDesc: You've built contraptions that defy both logic and physics. Your organizational system for parts is more sophisticated than most corporate filing systems.

264710.shortDesc: The ocean depths hold no fear for you anymore, just resource-gathering opportunities.
264710.longDesc: Thalassophobia? You've conquered it through exposure therapy. The reaper leviathan's roar is your lullaby now.

782330.shortDesc: Ripping and tearing is your cardio workout.
782330.longDesc: You've mastered the deadly ballet of demon slaying. Your gameplay is so aggressive it makes actual heavy metal musicians nervous.

739630.shortDesc: Getting scared with friends makes it slightly less terrifying.
739630.longDesc: You can identify ghost types faster than professional paranormal investigators. Your friends depend on you to carry the team while they hide in the van.

1145360.shortDesc: Death is just the beginning of your journey out of the underworld.
1145360.longDesc: You've died more times than most video game characters combined, and enjoyed every minute of it. Greek mythology is now basically your second religion.

1583120.shortDesc: You see card combinations in your dreams now.
1583120.longDesc: Your understanding of poker probability has evolved beyond mathematics into a mystical art form. Regular playing cards seem boring without Joker effects.

113200.shortDesc: Crying your way through procedurally generated dungeons has never been so fun.
113200.longDesc: Northernlios, is it you? You've seen disturbing item combinations that would make psychiatrists concerned. After 1000+ runs, you still discover new synergies that surprise you.

504230.shortDesc: You've learned that climbing a mountain is as much about the journey as it is about the destination.
504230.longDesc: Your thumb muscles have evolved specifically for precision platforming. You've died thousands of times but keep coming back because the music and story hit different.

219740.shortDesc: Your survival instincts are questionable, but your appreciation for gothic art is impeccable.
219740.longDesc: You've developed a strange obsession with collecting manure. Winter makes you instinctively check your thermal stone level.

311690.shortDesc: You can dodge roll in your sleep and dream of bullet-shaped enemies.
311690.longDesc: You've memorized every gun's stats and synergies. Table flipping is now your first response to any mildly inconvenient situation.

646570.shortDesc: Your deck-building skills exceed your life-building skills.
646570.longDesc: You see the world in terms of card synergies now. You've calculated probabilities so complex they'd make statisticians weep.

588650.shortDesc: Death is just another opportunity to get slightly better weapons.
588650.longDesc: You've died so many times the Collector considers you a close personal friend. Your muscle memory for combat moves has surpassed your ability to tie shoelaces.

751780.shortDesc: You've optimized resource collection down to a science.
751780.longDesc: Your factory efficiency would make manufacturing engineers jealous. You collect resources faster than the game can spawn them.

960090.shortDesc: Popping balloons has never been so strategically complex.
960090.longDesc: You know the exact pixel placement for maximum tower efficiency. MOAB-class bloons in your nightmares run from you, not the other way around.

239350.shortDesc: Your trust issues with bats and snakes are completely justified.
239350.longDesc: You've died in more creative ways than a Final Destination movie character. The shopkeeper's shotgun still gives you PTSD.

367520.shortDesc: The cute bug aesthetic fooled you into a world of challenging bosses and melancholic lore.
367520.longDesc: You've spent hours trying to understand the lore through environmental storytelling. The Pantheon of Hallownest is your personal Mt. Everest.

200210.shortDesc: Your night vision is better than your courage.
200210.longDesc: You've mastered the art of hiding in lockers and under beds. Your battery conservation skills are unmatched in real life.

219150.shortDesc: You like hurting other people, at least in neon-soaked pixel violence.
219150.longDesc: The soundtrack lives rent-free in your head. You restart levels so quickly it's become muscle memory.

262060.shortDesc: Stress management in-game is ironically increasing your stress in real life.
262060.longDesc: You hear the narrator's voice commenting on your life decisions. Your tolerance for unfairness has reached superhuman levels.

240720._name: Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy
240720.shortDesc: Your patience has been tested more than your gaming skills.
240720.longDesc: You've experienced emotions that don't even have names yet. Your keyboard/controller has survived abuse that would qualify as evidence in court.

2390130.shortDesc: You've rejected more job offers in-game than you've applied for in real life.
2390130.longDesc: Your spreadsheet skills could land you a job at any accounting firm. You've spent more time perfecting your 4-2-3-1 gegenpress than some coaches spend on their actual careers.

2050650.shortDesc: Your inventory management skills are better than your actual organizational abilities.
2050650.longDesc: The merchant's 'What are ya buyin?' lives rent-free in your head. You've developed a pavlovian response to typewriter sounds and instinctively check corners for shiny objects.

1250410.shortDesc: You now judge real pilots on their landing technique.
1250410.longDesc: You've visited more countries virtually than most people do in their lifetime. Your knowledge of aviation procedures makes actual pilots nervous during casual conversations.

1551360.shortDesc: Your D&D group is tired of hearing about your camp romances.
1551360.longDesc: You've reloaded saves more times than you've made actual life decisions. Your relationship with Shadowheart has lasted longer than some of your real-life partnerships.

289070.shortDesc: One... more... turn... until suddenly it's 4 AM.
289070.longDesc: You've launched more nuclear weapons than all world leaders combined. Gandhi's aggression doesn't surprise you anymore, just like your sleep deprivation doesn't surprise your friends.

1172470.shortDesc: You ping more in-game than you text in real life.
1172470.longDesc: You've memorized every drop location, weapon stat, and legend ability. Your movement skills have you sliding down grocery store aisles when nobody's looking.

346110.shortDesc: Your digital dinosaurs get more attention than your houseplants.
346110.longDesc: You've spent more time gathering berries than actual foragers. Your base building skills would impress architects if they weren't for housing extinct creatures.

704450.shortDesc: ROCK AND STONE! Your love for mining exceeds any dwarf in folklore.
704450.longDesc: Your beard may not be real, but your hatred for leaf-lovers is. Management would be proud of your mineral collection if they weren't so busy counting their profits.

1938090.shortDesc: Your scrap collecting efficiency exceeds your survival rate.
1938090.longDesc: The Company requires more profit, and you've become oddly comfortable with the idea of being disposable. You communicate in quotas and flashlight clicks now.

1593500.shortDesc: BOY! Your parenting style has been suspiciously influenced by Kratos.
1593500.longDesc: You've shouted 'BOY!' more times than you've said your own name. Your axe-throwing precision in-game makes up for your complete lack of athletic ability in real life.

976730.shortDesc: You've finished more fights than Master Chief himself.
976730.longDesc: The Halo theme is your mental soundtrack for mundane tasks. You've teabagged more digital corpses than you've had cups of actual tea.

203160.shortDesc: Your survival instincts are impressive, but your fondness for unnecessarily dangerous ruins is concerning.
203160.longDesc: You've destroyed more ancient artifacts than museums have preserved. Your climbing skills in-game vastly outmatch your ability to climb a single flight of stairs without getting winded.

261550.shortDesc: Your butter hoarding tendencies suggest you'd make a fine medieval lord.
261550.longDesc: You've built and lost more kingdoms than history has recorded. Your understanding of feudal politics exceeds that of most history professors.

394360.shortDesc: Your alternative history scenarios would make historians cry.
394360.longDesc: You know more about obscure WWII generals than actual veterans. Your understanding of supply chains exceeds that of most logistics companies.

1716740.shortDesc: Pokemon with guns seemed wrong until you tried it.
1716740.longDesc: You've built a labor camp of cute creatures and feel no remorse. Your Pal-based factory efficiency would make industrial engineers jealous.

1245620.shortDesc: You've died more times than you've had hot meals this year.
1245620.longDesc: Maidenless behavior is your specialty. You know the Lands Between better than your own neighborhood and have spent more time fighting Malenia than most people spend commuting.

881100.shortDesc: Your death count rivals the population of small countries.
881100.longDesc: You've died in more creative ways than anyone thought possible. Your wand-crafting skills would impress actual wizards if they existed.

386360.shortDesc: Your combo memorization exceeds your ability to remember birthdays.
386360.longDesc: You've practiced frame data more diligently than any academic subject. Your fingers move faster during matches than pianists during concertos.

582010.shortDesc: You've crafted more armor sets than you have outfits in your real closet.
582010.longDesc: Your knowledge of monster behavior patterns exceeds most zoologists. You've carted so many times your Palico has developed PTSD.

1245620.shortDesc: Your Viking architectural skills vastly outpace your IKEA furniture assembly abilities.
1245620.longDesc: You've built mead halls more impressive than actual historical structures. The sound of a troll approaching gives you more anxiety than real-life responsibilities.

1904540.shortDesc: Your historical knowledge is suspiciously focused on siege weapon efficiency.
1904540.longDesc: You've built more castles than medieval Europe. Your economic strategies in-game would impress actual economists if they weren't primarily focused on producing trebuchets.

1426210.shortDesc: The only successful relationship you've maintained is with your co-op partner.
1426210.longDesc: Your communication skills in-game are inversely proportional to your real-life conversation abilities. You've sworn at your partner more creatively than most people can imagine.

1293830.shortDesc: Your virtual driving skills are better than your actual road awareness.
1293830.longDesc: You've collected more cars virtually than Jay Leno has in real life. Your knowledge of Mexico's geography is entirely based on race tracks and jump locations.

359320.shortDesc: Your space travel experience exceeds NASA astronauts'... virtually.
359320.longDesc: You've explored more star systems than there are cities on Earth. Your spacecraft docking skills are more precise than your parallel parking abilities.

632360.shortDesc: Your god-like powers late-game compensate for your early-game struggles.
632360.longDesc: You've collected more items than retail stores carry inventory. Your understanding of proc coefficients would impress mathematicians if they cared about videogame stats.

304390.shortDesc: Your medieval combat skills are more polished than your modern manners.
304390.longDesc: You've invested more in learning sword techniques than useful life skills. Your knowledge of 15th century Bohemia exceeds that of most history professors.

1517290.shortDesc: Your expectations were higher than the actual game quality.
1517290.longDesc: You've experienced more bugs than an entomologist. Your patience for game updates exceeds most people's tolerance for daily commutes.

526870.shortDesc: Your factory efficiency exceeds your life efficiency by orders of magnitude.
526870.longDesc: You've calculated belt throughput more precisely than your monthly budget. Your power grid is more stable than your sleep schedule.

812140.shortDesc: Your knowledge of ancient Greece comes exclusively from killing people there.
812140.longDesc: You've climbed more historical structures than actual archaeologists have excavated. Your ship has sailed farther than most navy vessels.

275850.shortDesc: You've named more planets than astronomers have discovered.
275850.longDesc: Your base building skills exceed architectural degrees. You've spent more time scanning rocks than geologists spend in the field.

620980.shortDesc: Your arm muscles have evolved specifically for slicing virtual blocks.
620980.longDesc: You've developed a pavlovian response to any song with a good beat. Your living room furniture has suffered more accidental damage than items in actual sword fighting dojos.

546560.shortDesc: You've reloaded weapons more carefully in VR than most people handle delicate glassware.
546560.longDesc: Your relationship with Jeff is more traumatic than some actual breakups. You instinctively reach for objects in real life expecting gravity gloves to do the work.

438100.shortDesc: Your social life is more vibrant in virtual reality than in actual reality.
438100.longDesc: You've had more meaningful conversations with anime characters and furries than with your real friends. Your avatar collection is more extensive than your actual wardrobe.

286160.shortDesc: You've flipped more virtual tables than real ones... hopefully.
286160.longDesc: Your digital board game collection exceeds what most actual game stores carry. You've spent more time setting up games than actually playing them, just like in real life.

892970.shortDesc: Your Viking architectural skills vastly outpace your IKEA furniture assembly abilities.
892970.longDesc: You've built mead halls more impressive than actual historical structures. The sound of a troll approaching gives you more anxiety than real-life responsibilities.

1222670.shortDesc: Your understanding of virtual physics exceeds your grasp of actual physics.
1222670.longDesc: You've found more creative ways to use a crowbar than Gordon Freeman himself. Your ability to stack virtual objects is inversely proportional to your real-life organizational skills.

760540._name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim VR
760540.shortDesc: You've taken an arrow to the knee in virtual reality, which is somehow worse.
760540.longDesc: You can actually feel the weight of all the cheese wheels you've collected. Your virtual home decorating skills make interior designers question their career choices.

719950.shortDesc: Your virtual gun handling skills concern your real-life friends.
719950.longDesc: You've memorized reload patterns better than your own phone number. Your ability to communicate through hand gestures has reached mime artist levels of proficiency.

1121800.shortDesc: Space exploration from the comfort of your living room, motion sickness included.
1121800.longDesc: You've planted more flags on virtual planets than all of NASA combined. Your sense of wonder at alien landscapes is matched only by your annoyance at inventory management.

1536370.shortDesc: Being sus is somehow more personal when you can physically point fingers.
1536370.longDesc: Your emergency meeting hand-raising speed is Olympic-worthy. Your ability to lie with full body language has friends questioning your honesty in real life.

1523720.shortDesc: Time travel is more disorienting when you can actually reach out and touch history.
1523720.longDesc: You've solved puzzles across time periods with more dexterity than actual historians could manage. Your room-scale movement has resulted in more household accidents than regular gaming.

251570.shortDesc: Your zombie apocalypse preparation has evolved beyond mere hoarding.
251570.longDesc: You've built more fortresses against the undead than actual architects have designed real buildings. Your anxiety peaks every 7 days in real life now.

225540.shortDesc: Physics are more of a suggestion than a rule in your world.
225540.longDesc: You've used the grappling hook in more creative ways than Spider-Man. Your explosive tendencies would concern actual demolition experts.

244850.shortDesc: NASA could learn a thing or two from your spacecraft designs.
244850.longDesc: You've crashed more ships than the entire history of space exploration. Your understanding of zero-gravity physics is both impressive and completely impractical.

1158310.shortDesc: Your family tree is more of a family circle at this point.
1158310.longDesc: You've committed more medieval atrocities than actual historical figures. Your understanding of feudal politics would make Machiavelli proud and concerned.

17080.shortDesc: Your sanity meter is lower in real life than in the game.
17080.longDesc: The sound of footsteps behind you triggers fight-or-flight responses even outside the game. You check dark corners more thoroughly than professional security guards.

232090.shortDesc: Your zombie kill count exceeds most horror movie body counts.
232090.longDesc: You've perfected headshots to an art form that would concern mental health professionals. The soundtrack has ruined normal music for you forever.

108600.shortDesc: You've died of more mundane causes than actual zombie bites.
108600.longDesc: Your survival skills in-game far exceed your preparedness for real disasters. The phrase 'This is how you died' triggers more emotional responses than actual sad stories.

346110.shortDesc: Your tolerance for suffering rivals Buddhist monks.
346110.longDesc: You've built more failed settlements than actual ghost towns. Your characters have lost more limbs than a medieval battleground, and somehow you enjoy this.

677120.shortDesc: Your stealth coordination skills exceed actual special forces teams.
677120.longDesc: You've been jumpscared more times than haunted house employees. Your flashlight discipline would impress military operators on covert missions.

1172380.shortDesc: Your virtual combat creativity would concern law enforcement.
1172380.longDesc: You've invented more ways to use physics against enemies than actual martial artists. Your living room has suffered more accidental damage than gladiatorial arenas.

753640.shortDesc: Your understanding of time loops exceeds most physicists.
753640.longDesc: You've died to the sun exploding more times than most people have had hot meals. The game's soundtrack makes you emotional in ways you can't explain to non-players.

588650.shortDesc: Your virtual survival skills wouldn't translate to actual wilderness situations.
588650.longDesc: You've died of exposure more times than polar explorers. Your fear of wolves now extends to perfectly friendly dogs in real life.

1313140.shortDesc: Your cult leadership skills are suspiciously well-developed.
1313140.longDesc: You've sacrificed more followers than actual historical cults. Your cute animal aesthetic belies disturbing tendencies toward dictatorship and resource management.

1049360.shortDesc: The factory must grow, and now it surrounds you completely.
1049360.longDesc: You've optimized production lines better than industrial engineers with PhDs. Your dream in VR and in life is to create the perfect spaghetti of conveyor belts stretching to infinity.

885000.shortDesc: Your appreciation for bullet hell minimalism knows no bounds.
885000.longDesc: You've killed more monsters with a garlic aura than Van Helsing did with actual weapons. Your ability to dodge tiny pixelated projectiles exceeds your ability to avoid real-life obstacles.

1248130.shortDesc: You find more satisfaction in virtual cleaning than actual housework.
1248130.longDesc: You've pressure washed more virtual grime than professional cleaners do in their entire careers. Your real-life home remains dusty while your virtual environments gleam.

531270.shortDesc: Your one-person army would make action movie heroes jealous.
531270.longDesc: You've commanded more virtual troops than actual generals. Your tactical genius in blocky battlefields far exceeds your strategic thinking in real-life situations.

500.shortDesc: Your zombie apocalypse teamwork skills exceed your actual group project contributions.
500.longDesc: You hear the Witch's cry in your nightmares. Your instinct to avoid car alarms extends to being anxious around actual vehicles.

1986680.shortDesc: Your arm muscles have evolved specifically for virtual primate movement.
1986680.longDesc: You've destroyed more household items while flailing around than actual gorillas in rage. Your ability to climb virtual structures surpasses your capacity to climb a simple flight of stairs without getting winded.
